publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-625.2 Stewart Stevenson: Poverty in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-625) in the name of Carolyn Leckie, leave out from first "recognises" to end and insert "believes that the implementation of many of the proposals in the Scottish Socialist Party manifesto would only ensure that the unacceptable poverty of the poorest in our society would come to be shared by more of our citizens than at present." Supported by: Shona Robison*, Ms Sandra White*
